timeline.bodyText:
typo: the problem in the code
If this test only has the purpose to check whether we are affected by the bug in reflections8, then I think that it makes sense to link to that issue here in a comment.
timeline.author: FlorianHockmann

replies.bodyText: Thank you! I have fixed this misspell and also I have added the reference to the bug into javadoc of the test.
replies.author: porunov
